âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Encryption & Decryption (AES, DES, 3DES, Blowfish, ChaCha20) â€¢ Hash Generator (MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256 and more) â€¢ Hash Detector â€¢ File Steganography (hide/extract files in JPG/PNG images)
ðŸ“– Summary: CryptX is an Android toolkit designed for experimenting with various security techniques. It allows users to encrypt and decrypt data using common algorithms, generate and detect hash types, and hide files within images using steganography. The application is built with Jetpack Compose and does not require internet permissions or collect any data.
